    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Location lc,
                 ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGBackground bd)
        Description copied from class: block
        Draws the Image of the block on the Game-Grid. This abstract method is describes a block should be drawn on the grid itself. The GGBackground object "bd" can be used to draw the desired shape or image to the Location "lc". This has to be set in order to draw an Level on the grid.
        Specified by:
        draw in class block
        Parameters:
        lc - Location to draw in the Grid
        bd - GGBackground Object to draw

      • clone

        public block clone()
        Specified by:
        clone in class block
